text.div:
Tobacco Cessation Intervention Not Provided, Medical Reason

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G9907 Documentation of medical reason(s) for not providing tobacco cessation intervention (e.g., limited life expectancy, other medical reason)

name: Tobacco Cessation Intervention Not Provided, Medical Reason
